properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM TB_NONMEM WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_STATUS, RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, TO_CHAR(R.CHECKIN_TIME,'YY/MM/DD, HH24:MI') AS CHECKIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.CHECKOUT_TIME,'YY/MM/DD, HH24:MI') AS CHECKOUT_DATE, BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT_PRICE, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_NUM, MAX_PEOPLE, M.CHECKIN_TIME AS CHECKIN_TIME, M.CHECKOUT_TIME AS CHECKOUT_TIME, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_ADDRESS, HOTEL_PATH, ROOM_IMG FROM TB_NONMEM JOIN TB_RESERVATION R ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM M USING (ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL USING (HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'N'
